Meta Title: Meta Description: M1-Inside Hero M2-Image Intro H1 Although the landscape of travel has changed, your well-being remains our highest priority. As you consider your future travel plans to San Francisco, we assure you that we are monitoring the COVID-19 situation every day and taking proactive steps to ensure the health and safety of our guests and staff. On behalf of everyone at Hotel Nikko San Francisco, stay safe, and thank you for your continued loyalty. A2-Feature Snippet Feature Box 1: AAA Best of Housekeeping Hotel In our 30 year history, we've been known for our rigorous cleaning procedures, being named a AAA â€˜Best of Housekeeping' property for 2020. We continue to deep clean with hospital-grade disinfectants along with expanded COVID-19 protocols. You can expect to see enhanced procedures in every area of the hotel. Feature Box 2: Highest Standards of Cleaning We are committed to upholding the highest quality of standards and have enhanced our cleaning and disinfecting procedures. Partnering with industry-leading experts, CHLA & the CDC, Ecolab and Clorox, we're enhancing cleanliness and using new protocols to provide you with the ultimate in hospitality and service in the same manner you have become accustomed to. Hand sanitizer and disinfecting wipes available in guest rooms and at high-touch points throughout the hotel Increased frequency of cleaning public spaces, including the front desk, the concierge desk, elevators and elevator buttons, door handles, public bathrooms, and room keys. Additional deep cleaning of high-touch surfaces and best practices for pools, fitness centers, and lounges. Feature Box 3: For Your Protection All guests and employees are required to wear masks in public spaces. Proof of Vaccination is required for entry into the Health Club and Gym, Swimming Pool, Feinstein's at the Nikko, Restaurant ANZU and Kanpai Lounge. Hotelier training and certification B11-FAQs FAQs PageInfoBlock PageTemplateName: Base Layout Page Default Title: Clean Commi Default Description: Rooms Header1: Navbar with center logo Header2: Footer1: Footer with signup Footer2: ShowInNavigation: No

Meta Title: Meta Description: M1-Inside Hero M2-Image Intro H1 - Overview: H1 Enjoy a getaway or business trip to San Francisco's Union Square with Hotel Nikko. Book your stay direct on our site or reach out to our team for reservations, to plan an event, or to answer questions about our accommodations, venues, and things to do in San Francisco. We look forward to having you back as our guest. For reservations, call Hotel Nikko San Francisco at (415) 403-1800 . C9-Map Snippet Map B7-Amenities Bullets Hotel Nikko By Email General Inquiries info@hotelnikkosf.com Events & Meetings sales@hotelnikkosf.com Restaurants & Catering catering@hotelnikkosf.com Private Dining & Events at ANZU anzuprivateparty@hotelnikkosf.com Events & Reservations at Feinstein's feinsteins@hotelnikkosf.com Club Nikko Health Club ClubNikko@hotelnikkosf.com D1-Offer Banner Lost & Found Leave something behind? Please submit a Lost and Found Items Retrieval Form; items will be held for 30 days, unless previously inquired about. Contact Details Hotel Nikko San Francisco 222 Mason St, San Francisco, California 94102 Phone 1-866-898-4128 Email info@hotelnikkosf.com C10-Contact Form Get In Touch Form PageInfoBlock PageTemplateName: Base Layout Page Default Title: Contact Default Description: Contact Header1: Navbar with center logo Header2: Footer1: Footer with signup Footer2: ShowInNavigation: Yes

Meta Title: Meta Description: M1-Inside Hero M2-Image Intro H1 - Overview: A2-Feature Snippet Be Part of Our Hospitality Culture Our culture is based on five core values: Service, Collaboration, Credibility, Achievement, and Fun. If this sounds like you, apply for one of our current job opportunities at Hotel Nikko San Francisco. When you join our team, you join our family.
